template: Travelling to work by {input} emits approximately {carConv} kg GHG per mile.
Spending {input} fewer hours driving each week would save 0.8 tonnes of GHG. Over the course of a year this would come to 45 tonnes, equal to a plane
Living in a {input} house produces, on average, 30% more GHG than a terrace house.
Each year, taking {input} return fights within Europe and {input} return flights to other continents emits a similar quantity of greenhouse gas as {similar}.
Heating your home using {input} emits three times more greenhouse gas than using electricity.
